text: William Morrison (31 March 1934 – 2001) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a wing half for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2001 deaths Category:People from Edinburgh Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football wing halves Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Southend United F.C. players Category:Bedford Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Willie Morrison
